children.description: The content of the expansion panel summary.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

expandIcon.description: The icon to display as the expand indicator.

IconButtonProps.description: Props applied to the `IconButton` element wrapping the expand icon.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.expanded: Pseudo-class applied to the root element, children wrapper element and `IconButton` component if `expanded={true}`.
descriptions.focused: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `focused={true}`.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.content: Styles applied to the children wrapper element.
descriptions.expandIcon: Styles applied to the `IconButton` component when `expandIcon` is supplied.
